name: GearHead Caramel Demo: Winter Mocha
description:
Six months after the Typhon Incident, you are invited to a charity mecha tournament at the newly built Mauna Arena. This is a short demo scenario for GearHead Caramel, the latest game in the GearHead series and the first one written in Python. It should only take ten to twenty minutes to play through, but thanks to the random story and puzzle generation you'll have a different experience each time. Characters can be imported from GearHead1.
Try it out and let me know what you think.
